requestBody.description: Batch of receipts with payments and items grouped by tax type

fieldDescriptions.type: POSAPI payload type (B2C_RECEIPT, B2B_RECEIPT, B2C_INVOICE, B2B_INVOICE, STOCK_QR).
fieldDescriptions.taxType: Overall tax category for the header (VAT_ABLE, VAT_FREE, VAT_ZERO, NO_VAT).
fieldDescriptions.branchNo: Three digit branch identifier issued with the licence.
fieldDescriptions.posNo: POS terminal identifier registered with the tax authority.
fieldDescriptions.merchantTin: Registered TIN of the merchant submitting the receipt.
fieldDescriptions.consumerNo: Citizen registry or phone number for B2C receipts.
fieldDescriptions.totalVAT: VAT amount for the transaction when taxType is VAT_ABLE.
fieldDescriptions.totalCityTax: City tax amount when applicable to VAT_ABLE receipts.
fieldDescriptions.receipts: Groups of line items organised by POSAPI tax type.
fieldDescriptions.receipts[].taxType: Tax type for this group (VAT_ABLE, VAT_FREE, VAT_ZERO, NO_VAT).
fieldDescriptions.receipts[].totalAmount: Amount for this tax group including tax.
fieldDescriptions.receipts[].totalVAT: VAT total for this group when taxType is VAT_ABLE.
fieldDescriptions.receipts[].items: Line items with product and tax information for this group.
fieldDescriptions.payments: Breakdown of how the receipt or invoice was paid.
fieldDescriptions.payments[].type: Payment method code. Supported values: CASH, PAYMENT_CARD, BANK_TRANSFER, MOBILE_WALLET, EASY_BANK_CARD.
fieldDescriptions.payments[].amount: Amount paid with the selected payment method.
